tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MarinePollutionData (
    region_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    region_name TEXT,
    pollution_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Pollution_Levels (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region_id INT,
    pollution_level DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES Marine_Regions(region_id)
);
